location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 40 of 1833 from David Anderson Blane, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bushire, to Charles Norris, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a number of communications from the Government Agent at Sharga [Sharjah] respecting the state of relations between the Wahabee [Wahhabi], the Joasmees [QawƒÅsim], and the Beniyas [Bani Yas]; no copies of these enclosures have been included in this volume.
